question: Question_02_(f)
statement:
What can you say about the eigenvalues and eigenvectors of a stochastic
matrix if all the entries are strictly positive?
sols:
-\textgreater{} The largest eigenvalue is 1

-\textgreater{} All other eigenvalues are less than 1

-\textgreater{} The eigenvector of the eigenvalue of 1 can be scaled to
have all positive entries
